data.text: @roblee4 @RyanSeacrest We have nothing. I wish we could help others. I have a fundraiser to help the elderly, but nobody donates. I'm quite surprised actually.

@roblee4 @RyanSeacrest Ryan... God bless you for caring for our darling daughter Megan and our SIL Brett. Brett has been so good to our girl, he’s a great daddy and loving husband. I was shocked when she called me on my cell. She’s downstate in Traverse City and I’m in the U.P. Of Michigan, a Yooper.
@roblee4 @Fisterh @RyanSeacrest They had been thru so much it seemed like it came just when they needed it most.  @RyanSeacrest @LiveKellyRyan #TriviaGame  Kudos #MichaelGelman!!
@roblee4 @RyanSeacrest I loved it, so deserving.  I cried.  @RyanSeacrest @LiveKellyRyan #TriviaGame
@roblee4 @RyanSeacrest I just saw it. I am still crying.😂

@Fisterh @RyanSeacrest The lady lost the contest on the show and he personally stepped in to pay for her vacation after he found out her husband lost his colon to a disease. It may have been for ratings but I highly doubt it in this case. I just hope it would inspire others.
